= Getting started =
== Prerequisites ==
To build scxmlcc, the boost library must be installed.

Install boost with e.g. apt-get:
{{{
sudo apt-get install libboost-all-dev
}}}
== Optaining And Building scxmlcc ==
scxmlcc is available as compressed releases or directly using SVN. The latest and previous releases is always available at [Download].

To optain scxmlCC using SVN, see the [https://code.google.com/p/scxmlcc/source/checkout Source] tab.

To build scxmlcc, simply execute make:
{{{
cd src
make
}}}
If you also want to build the examples:
{{{
cd examples
make
}}}
